@Bl3NDER

Follow these instructions EXACTLY and it should work

"1. Go to your crack folder, open the orbit folder: copy & paste the contents of the orbit folder to the Ubisoft Game Launcher folder in:
(C:Program Files (x86)UbisoftUbisoft Game Launcher) for x64 based systems
(C:Program FilesUbisoftUbisoft Game Launcher) for X86 Based Systems
*You may want to disable your anti-virus on this step just in case*
2. Open Futuresoldier.exe. Notice that the username SKiDROW is already there. Leave it.
6. Make a password 6-8 characters long. Check Remember Me
*Make sure the Force Offline mode is checked – Hit Apply*
3. Click Log in.
4. You will get a screen saying: “The Uplay Launcher is in offline mode. You can play the game, but other Uplay features are not available offline”. Ignore. Hit PLAY!"
The game is working good but There´s black bars in my screen...I play on 1920*1080. But i tried others resolution but nothing...Anyone have the fix for this?

@Punishmenthurts

Its probably your scaling options, check Nvidia Control Panel or CCC and fix your scaling options.

Set it to Aspect Ratio or Fullscreen and make it "Override the scaling mode set by games and programs". 
See if that forces it to go fullscreen and not have black bars

I see alot of people having this issue but i do not think it has anything to do with the game because i have tried 1920x1080 and 2560x1440, both 16:9 aspect ratio resolutions and i do not get black bars at all.
